thread.title: Boris Laubert
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Boris Laubert

author: Boris Laubert
title: Boris Laubert
text: I purchased a pair of Full Tilt ski boots and had them shipped to the US. Not only were they the best price I could find by a long shot but they arrived lightning quick. Odered on Tuesday, they arrived, as promised, on Thursday -and that's to the West Coast. I couldn't be happier with the product or the service. Would definitely do it again!
